#Ressources

## Pro Git
This free ebook is an excellent ressource for anything git related and very well explained:  
https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2

## YouTube videos

This tutorial by Cory Scafer covers all the basics
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HVsySz-h9r4

Git Tutorial: Fixing Common Mistakes and Undoing Bad Commits
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FdZecVxzJbk


I have also enjoyed the three part YouTube git series by David Mahler with great examples.
It has a slightly higher speed than the above, for more impatient folks.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uR6G2v_WsRA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FyAAIHHClqI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gg4bLk8cGNo&t=85s

Both are based on the ProGit book and cover the most important concepts in a very approachable way.
